description:
go-tour: recommend installing weekly (just temporarily)

The playground is now updated to the latest weekly snapshot,
so the tour needs to be updated as well. It's not a great
experience to recommend release when they've just been learning
how to write Go 1 code.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour

http://codereview.appspot.com/5701068/diff/1/static/index.html
File static/index.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5701068/diff/1/static/index.html#newcode93
static/index.html:93: (the latest weekly snapshot), then use
On 2012/02/28 04:20:59, r wrote:
> probably want to say why it's the weekly. 

Done.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=1ee650a26106 ***

go-tour: recommend installing weekly (just temporarily)

The playground is now updated to the latest weekly snapshot,
so the tour needs to be updated as well. It's not a great
experience to recommend release when they've just been learning
how to write Go 1 code.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5701068
